nodes.text: A Human male commander of the Galactic Republic's Xesh Squad was stationed on Hoth around 3642 BBY, when he was killed.

Xesh Squad Commander appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Hoth. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
